name: movie-rating-extension
description: Rate and discover movies with community ratings and Kinopoisk integration

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run copy-files
scripts.copy-files: npm run copy-js && npm run copy-html && npm run copy-css && npm run copy-icons && npm run copy-libs && npm run copy-manifest
scripts.dev: npm run build && npm run watch
scripts.watch: nodemon --watch src --watch popup.js --watch background.js --watch search.js --watch firestore.js --watch popup.html --watch search.html --watch popup.css --watch manifest.json --exec "npm run build"
scripts.package: npm run build && cd dist && zip -r ../movie-rating-extension.zip .
